titles.title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants for the construction of certain treatment works, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7067)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

term.name: Federal aid to water pollution control

bill.summary: 6/16/1994--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to make grants for the construction of publicly owned treatment works in the South Valley of Bernalillo County, New Mexico. Authorizes the Administrator to use $25 million of specified funds made available to EPA under the Departments of Veterans Affairs and Housing and Urban Development, and Independent Agencies Appropriations Act, 1994 to carry out such construction.
